rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0010
rows.name: Ever since Void turned up,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0020
rows.name:
we've been witnessing Ganglion remnants
stirring back to life, all across Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0030
rows.name:
They're as vulnerable as us,
what with the de-mat events and Ghosts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0040
rows.name:
But they've also got a new objective
that'll have lit a fire under them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0050
rows.name: Objective...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0060
rows.name: Oh, Void's floating continent?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0070
rows.name:
Volitaris is a special place. Those who heard Void's call
have begun some holy pilgrimage there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0080
rows.name:
For the promise of a new world under
their creator's leadership.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0090
rows.name: They may be fragmented at best,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0100
rows.name:
and little more than a minor nuisance,
but these recent events[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0110
rows.name: have granted them new purpose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0120
rows.name: You'd think they'd want to regroup quietly...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0130
rows.name: Instead, they're out there raising hell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0140
rows.name: I'm glad they've kicked the blues, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0150
rows.name: throwing an all-you-can-loot-and-plunder buffet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0160
rows.name: That part I don't love.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0170
rows.name:
Remember, they were a coalition.
Their mission, to eradicate Samaar's descendants, including us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0180
rows.name: A tiger cannot so easily change its stripes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0190
rows.name: The fight for survival, it never ends, huh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0200
rows.name: We've come a long way indeed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0210
rows.name:
This place... It is our second home.
We've overcome the odds, made it a safe haven.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0220
rows.name:
De-mat events. Ghosts. Ganglion...
We must remain firm against these ever-present threats.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0240
rows.name: In addition...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0250
rows.name:
we must reclaim the cores Void stole,
and prepare to leave for a new world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0260
rows.name: Bluntly, the only choice left for us now...is to run.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0270
rows.name: In other words,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0280
rows.name: we're talking about a second Project Exodus.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0290
rows.name:
Just when we'd beaten that damned Luxaar...
We just can't seem to catch a break, can we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0300
rows.name: No kidding...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0310
rows.name: Just when I was starting to put down some roots here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_JNK0010
rows.name: Sympathize

rows.label: xs32020100_SEL0010
rows.name: Say that you don't want to leave either.

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0320
rows.name: A truly gut-rending thought.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_JNK0020
rows.name: Rebuke

rows.label: xs32020100_SEL0020
rows.name: Say that it is what it is.

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0330
rows.name: Guess so.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0340
rows.name: Don't mean it's not a kick in the teeth...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0350
rows.name: I do share your grief.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0360
rows.name: However...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0370
rows.name: we must face the facts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0380
rows.name:
The dematerialization phenomenon is spreading,
and eventually, it will engulf the planet in its entirety.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0390
rows.name: This truth is...unequivocal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0400
rows.name: And this time, it's not just humanity's future that's at stake.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0410
rows.name: Our aim now is to evacuate all races that live on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0420
rows.name: Every single one...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0430
rows.name: Of course, all those that would be amenable to our proposal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0440
rows.name: Regrettably...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0450
rows.name:
any lifeforms we cannot communicate with
will not be considered.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0460
rows.name: That's quite...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0470
rows.name: How should we say...? Egoistic, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_JNK0030
rows.name: Bristle

rows.label: xs32020100_SEL0030
rows.name: Protest that humanity cannot discriminate.

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0480
rows.name: I understand how you feel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0490
rows.name: I didn't propose it lightly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0500
rows.name: But frankly, it's just not feasible to do otherwise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0510
rows.name:
Some species are dangerous,
some others simply too violent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0520
rows.name:
With the time we have, and the available personnel,
finding a way to save them all is impossible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_JNK0040
rows.name: Acquiesce

rows.label: xs32020100_SEL0040
rows.name: Agree that it's unavoidable.

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0530
rows.name: Indeed...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0540
rows.name: I wish there were another way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0550
rows.name:
However... This isn't the first time humanity has made opportunistic,
discriminatory choices, and it will not be the last.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0560
rows.name: We're not gods.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0570
rows.name:
We each have one life, and in its course,
we must bear the burden of our sins.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0580
rows.name: Okay, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0590
rows.name: Even narrowing it down, just to the sentient races...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0595
rows.name: Will that work?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0600
rows.name: Good point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0610
rows.name: If our only choice is to build a lifeboat...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0620
rows.name:
Making something big enough...
It's gonna take some time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0630
rows.name:
We've agreed on a cooperative partnership
with the Ma-non to obtain a ship.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0640
rows.name:
We're going to use the Ma-non ship?
The one over NLA?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0650
rows.name: You betcha.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0660
rows.name:
Eyeballing it, it should have the capacity.
Enough to carry all evacuees.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0670
rows.name: Of course, it'll need a fair bit of retrofitting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0680
rows.name:
We'll need to incorporate the Ares's jump drive,
and the Lifehold Core's protoplasmic fluid system.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0690
rows.name:
But if we work together,
we should make it before the reaper comes a-knockin'.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0700
rows.name: Why, that's feeding three cooks with one stove![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0710
rows.name: Right, so that part we've got tied up with a bow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0720
rows.name:
We've already contacted all known xeno communities.
They should be apprised of the plan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0730
rows.name:
Sadly, some of them did respond they're planning
to go down with the planet, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0740
rows.name: most are currently in the process of relocating to NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0750
rows.name: Then we've got no time to lose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0760
rows.name: Right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0770
rows.name: As of now, all active BLADE personnel...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0780
rows.name: are ordered to give this plan the highest degree of priority.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0790
rows.name: Broadly, we have two objectives:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0800
rows.name:
helping to construct the escape vessel,
and supporting those who want to come to NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0810
rows.name: It's all hands on deck.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0820
rows.name:
We may require troops to take assignments
across division lines.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0830
rows.name: Be ready for anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32020100_MSG0840
rows.name: Roger![ST:wait ]
